hero_subtitle: We’re getting married on Saturday, October 11, 2025

x.name: Christiana Loizidou
x.content: She loves her friends, traveling, and has a magical talent for cooking. Her world is filled with colors and flavors, just like the journeys she loves and the dishes she creates with love. Today, she is preparing to begin a new chapter in her life, marrying her great love and sharing her happiness with everyone around her.

f.name: Foivos Heracleous
f.a: He loves his friends and fills their lives with joy. With vitality and energy, he is always ready for new adventures and special moments with his loved ones.
